description:
An abandoned wife seeks revenge. A nursemaid sacrifices her life for her charge.  A snake demands to marry a girl.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shinda Tsuma no Akuryou / Uba Zakura / Hebi Zamurai
The Dead Wife`s Evil Spirit / Nursemaid Cherry Blossoms / The Snake Samurai
死んだ妻の悪霊 / 乳母ざくら / へび侍
